required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: FS118 First in Human Study in Patients With Advanced Malignancies After PD-1/PD-L1 Containing Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Open-Label, Dose-Escalation, and Cohort Expansion First-in-Human Study of the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Activity of FS118, a LAG-3/PD-L1 Bispecific Antibody, in Patients With Advanced Malignancies That Have Progressed On or After Prior PD-1/PD-L1 Containing Therapy

brief_summary.textblock: This study will be conducted in adult patients diagnosed with advanced tumors to characterize the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics (PK), and activity of FS118. This is a Phase 1, multi-center, open label, multiple-dose, first in human study, designed to systematically assess safety and tolerability, and to identify the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) and/or recommended Phase 2 dose (RP2D) for FS118 in patients with advanced tumors. Pharmacokinetics, pharmacodynamics, immunogenicity, and response will also be assessed.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (Safety and Tolerability)
primary_outcome.description: Incidence, severity and duration of treatment emergent adverse events will be assessed by CTCAEv4.03

primary_outcome.measure: Serum Concentration vs time profile of FS118
primary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (concentrations measured in mcg/mL)
Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (Cmax measured in mcg/mL)

primary_outcome.measure: Time to reach maximum serum concentration (Tmax) of FS118
primary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (Tmax measured in hours)

primary_outcome.measure: Trough serum concentration (Ctrough) of FS118 prior to the next dose
primary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (Ctrough measured in mcg/mL)

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the serum FS118 concentration vs time Curve (AUC)
primary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (AUC measured in d.mcg/mL)
Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (CL measured in mL/day)

secondary_outcome.measure: Disease Response as assessed by RECIST 1.1 or the Lugano classification, as applicable, and iRECIST
secondary_outcome.description: Assessed by RECIST 1.1 or the Lugano classification, as applicable, and iRECIST
Incidence of FS118 immunogenicity will include ADA detection and analysis (incidence measured in titre)

arm_group.description: The initial cohorts will enroll sequentially as single-patient cohorts. If no DLT or ≥Grade 2 study drug related adverse event is observed, then dosing will proceed in a 3+3 design.

intervention.description: Dosing of patients will occur intravenously (IV) weekly in 3-week treatment cycles until iCPD (ie, immune confirmed progressive disease) (or progressive disease [PD] per the Lugano classification for patients with lymphoma), unacceptable toxicity, or discontinuation.
